column1: Smoque BBQ////I've been here a few times and have never been disappointed. I am a huge fan of their brisket. Don't leave without trying the cobbler. Normally
column2: I am not fond of coleslaw
column3: but theirs has changed my opinion with it's balance of crispness
column4: light dressing and tanginess. The portions are perfect enough to leave full
column5: but not having to take anything home.
